title: PlayStation 5 Hits 10 Million Sold! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.28.21
description:
Blessing and Tim discuss PlayStation 5 and Xbox having their fastest selling console numbers, more updates on Activision Blizzard, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:08 - Housekeeping
A new Gamescast is up right now featuring Raven Simone aka Bobdunga. We talk all about lost games media and how she was able to recover a lost Mean Girls DS game. That episode is live right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services.
Tomorrow at noon we’re reacting to that Annapurna Interactive Showcase, will we get more 12 minutes? Stray? Solar Ash? Tune in tomorrow to Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames to see our reactions.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Donavan Harkness & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:07 -  PS5 has hit 10 million units sold - Christopher Dring @ GiBiz
00:14:50 -  The Console sales success stories continue: Xbox Series X/S are Microsoft’s ‘fastest selling consoles ever’ - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:22:30 -  A new AAA studio has been formed by Last of Us and Call of Duty devs - Joe Skrebels @ IGN
00:32:05 -  Ad
00:35:15 - We’ve got a few more updates on the Activision Blizzard saga
Let’s start with a statement from Bobby Kotick - Ian Walker @ Kotaku
00:45:26 - Blue Box is back on their bullshit
00:50:20 - Lady Gaga was supposed to come out of a Mario Warp Pipe at the Olympics - Liana Ruppert @ GameInformer
00:53:00 - Out today
00:58:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim

Blessing and Tim discuss PlayStation 5 and Xbox having their fastest selling console numbers, more updates on Activision Blizzard, and more!


Time Stamps -

00:04:08 - Housekeeping

A new Gamescast is up right now featuring Raven Simone aka Bobdunga. We talk all about lost games media and how she was able to recover a lost Mean Girls DS game. That episode is live right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services.

Tomorrow at noon we’re reacting to that Annapurna Interactive Showcase, will we get more 12 minutes? Stray? Solar Ash? Tune in tomorrow to Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames to see our reactions.
